comments.body: We'll likely pick up to 5 winners who will win $100/each in BTC.

comments.author: Unknown Op
comments.body: Dear Hhampuz, I has pointed out that there may be a mistake in your subject line for the Whirlwind Avatar Contest thread. Specifically, you have mentioned the end date of the contest as March 7th. Can you confirm if this is correct?

comments.author: roksana.hee
comments.body: Quote from: Hhampuz on April 07, 2023, 09:53:52 PMWe'll likely pick up to 5 winners who will win $100/each in BTC.Dear Hhampuz,It's a great offer for me. I find out here a mistake that shows on the subject line of 1st one "Whirlwind.money | Avatar Contest | Create avatars and win BTC | Ends May 7th!" and the 2nd one you wrote, "Whirlwind.money | Avatar Contest | Create avatars and win BTC | Ends March 7th!"Here the 2nd one shows "Ends March 7th!". It's a mistake. I hope you will check it, and edited.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: I think there's should be mentioned if multiple accounts aren't allowed. Someone might think if they have 3 alts, they can submit 9 avatars. What about a rule of an account registered after this thread was created can't join this contest? this could prevent abusers. What do you think?

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on April 07, 2023, 11:27:40 PMI think there's should be mentioned if multiple accounts aren't allowed. Someone might think if they have 3 alts, they can submit 9 avatars. What about a rule of an account registered after this thread was created can't join this contest? this could prevent abusers. What do you think? If anyone abuses any of my campaigns or contests with the intent to deceit for financial gain they will be given negative trust and barred from entering anything that I will launch.

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: I want users to create something original, themselves. No AI generated art.

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: Quote from: Hhampuz on April 08, 2023, 10:34:59 AMI want users to create something original, themselves. No AI generated art.Then you should have indicated this in the conditions of participation in this avatar contest.By the way, how are you going to differentiate it? What a time: now in each contest have to clarify that the results of creativity should be generated by leather sacks humans, and not AI.
